name: Living Burning Hands
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, poisoned, prone
book: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.Amorphous: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
traits.Magic Resistance: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
